title: Vale generates a false positive warning for "between"

labels.name: area/housekeeping
labels.description: Issue type for generalized tasks not related to bugs or enhancements

body:
### Description

In https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/32869/files, Vale generates false positive warnings for valid uses of "between". For example:

* In `{project-name} supports configuration profiles that you can use to group related properties and switch between profiles as required.` 

I request we demote this rule to a suggestion and then try to refine it so that it has fewer false positives. 

### Implementation ideas

_No response_
